Question: Which high school system/curriculum did you go through?
Help: If you're still in high school, select the one you're enrolled in.

Question: How did you acquire your high school qualification?
Help: If you haven't yet, select for how you will.

Responses: Through the Exame Nacional para Certificação de Competências de Jovens e Adultos (ENCCEJA)

Question: What high school qualification/s do you have?
Help: If you don't yet, select for when you do.
Responses: Certificate of Completion of Secondary Education (Certificado de Conclusão do Ensino Médio)
Technical Secondary Certificate (Título de Técnico/Técnico de Nível Médio)
Combined Certificate (Certificado de Conclusão do Ensino Médio & Título de Técnico/Técnico de Nível Médio)

Question: What grades are you submitting part of this form?
Help: If you're submitting grades from a partial report card, submit the most recent one.

Question: How many subjects are you submitting?
Select your Area of Specialization/Specialized Training Itineraries (itinerários formativos).
Help: Select "all" if you graduated before the implementation of the new high school program or if your school does not do specilizations.
Responses: Languages and Related Technologies (linguagens e suas tecnologias)
Mathematics and Technologies (matemática e suas tecnologias)
Natural Sciences and Technologies (ciências da natureza e suas tecnologias)
Applied Social Sciences and Humanities (ciências humanas e sociais aplicadas)
